definition: foreign teacher (abbr. for 外國教師|外国教师)/greenhorn/novice/amateurish/religion other than Buddhism (term used by Buddhists)

sentences.english: ESL L teacher is a very special existence in our life.
sentences.chinese: 外教是我們生活中一個特別的存在。

sentences.english: Foreign teachers are based on the characteristics of your implementation of the most effective method of teaching counseling.
sentences.chinese: 外教都根據您的特點實施最爲有效的教學輔導方法。

sentences.english: Is the school SAFEA authorized to employ foreign teachers?
sentences.chinese: 學校是否取得聘請外教資格證？

sentences.english: Enterprise recruitment of foreign teachers is mainly internal staff or leading assistant positions.
sentences.chinese: 企業招聘外教主要是員工內訓或者領導助理等職務。

sentences.english: We provide half day full English teaching with foreigner everyday.
sentences.chinese: 英文要從小抓起，肚兜提供每天半天全英文外教教學。

sentences.english: It is my foreign teacher Moses to take.
sentences.chinese: 它可是我的外教老師摩西取的。

sentences.english: Fourth the specific choice of materials of foreign teachers in teaching determined by the faculties and the foreign teachers.
sentences.chinese: 外教在教學中具體教材的選用由各系和外教協商決定。

sentences.english: Fourth the specific choice of materials of foreign teachers in teaching determined by the faculties and the foreign teachers.
sentences.chinese: 外教在教學中具體教材的選用由各系和外教協商決定。

sentences.english: I saw two foreign teachers accompanied by several students come to the Spring Garden.
sentences.chinese: 我看到兩個外教在幾個同學的陪同下來到春園。

sentences.english: Home-style foreign teachers please see the specific process.
sentences.chinese: 查看請住家式外教的具體流程。

sentences.english: Recently my son had an English class with Stephen, a middle-aged man teacher from New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 我兒子剛上高一，最近上了一次外教英語課。

sentences.english: Were you taught by any foreign teachers？
Beacon campuses are now located in different key areas of Chongqing city;
sentences.chinese: 畢肯外教教學點分佈在重慶主要城區。

sentences.english: Foreign teachers visit the Historian, Mr. Gu Yanwu's home.
sentences.chinese: 我院外教訪問顧史學家炎武先生故居。

sentences.english: I’ve got an appointment with my foreign teacher at 4:30.
sentences.chinese: 我約了外教四點半見面。

sentences.english: He ean have been delayed by fog.
sentences.chinese: 他可能被大霧外教口語陪練所耽誤了。
